titleStmt.title: England's fair garland fully furnished with variety of new songs. Containing much mirth and delight. This may be printed, R.P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Kell, at the Blew Anchor in Pye-Corner, near West-Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Magdalene College Library, Cambridge.
